function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased risk of viral spread within homes due to prolonged periods spent indoors with family members and limited ventilation.","Impact":"Greater likelihood of COVID-19 transmission resulting in illness and potentially severe outcomes for family members.","Mitigation":"Improved ventilation systems, air purifiers, and spatial design to facilitate social distancing within the home.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HVAC systems with HEPA filters, smart ventilation systems.","People":"Families, individuals living in shared accommodation.","Owner":"Architects, home developers, homeowners."},{"Description":"Inadequate living space and facilities for remote work and study, leading to increased stress and reduced productivity.","Impact":"Negative impact on mental health, well-being, and productivity due to lack of suitable spaces for work and study.","Mitigation":"Design and creation of multifunctional spaces, dedicated home office areas, and flexible furniture to accommodate remote work and study.","Technologies":"Smart furniture, modular room dividers, ergonomic workstations.","People":"Remote workers, students, individuals engaging in online learning.","Owner":"Architects, interior designers, homeowners."},{"Description":"Inadequate quarantine facilities within homes for infected individuals, leading to increased risk of transmission within the household.","Impact":"Greater risk of secondary infections within the home and challenges in isolating infected individuals effectively.","Mitigation":"Design and creation of dedicated quarantine rooms and private bathrooms, with separate ventilation and access to minimize exposure to other household members.","Technologies":"Negative pressure room systems, antimicrobial surfaces, touchless fixtures.","People":"Families with infected members, individuals at high risk of COVID-19 complications.","Owner":"Health authorities, architects, homeowners."}]}
